entry.summary: RTâ€‚Rohit I just revamped my portfolio in a few mins and here's how you can do it as well ðŸ‘‡ With so many ideas and little time, many projects are left behind. One project for me was my web portfolio But I was finally did it with the power of rapid prototyping and these tools: - @framer for design inspiration - @v0 + @nextjs for development - @arlinklabs + @ArweaveEco for deployment and hosting - @ar_io_network's ArNS for a domain name My revamped portfolio: https://ropats16.ar.io/ My template Repository: https://github.com/ropats16/arweave-web-portfolio-template
